alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:44PM CDT until June 06 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN BUFFALO...SOUTHWESTERN SHERMAN AND NORTHEASTERN DAWSON COUNTIES... At 644 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mason City to near Oconto, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Litchfield around 650 PM CDT. Hazard around 700 PM CDT. Pleasanton around 715 PM CDT. Sumner around 720 PM CDT. Miller around 725 PM CDT. Amherst around 745 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
